医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
FDA 批准贝克曼库尔特生命科学 AQUIOS STEM 系统用于干细胞分析Beckman Coulter Life Sciences 是实验室自动化和创新领域的全球领导者，已获得美国食品和药物管理局 (FDA) 的 510(k) 许可，可在美国分销其广受欢迎的 AQUIOS STEM 系统。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/FDA-clears-Beckman-Coulter-Life-Sciences-AQUIOS-STEM-System-for-stem-cell-analysis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/FDA-clears-Beckman-Coulter-Life-Sciences-AQUIOS-STEM-System-for-stem-cell-analysis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=74035ebe-accc-4fd7-b7a9-fc4aa6381daf Mon, 04 Dec 2023 23:53:00 -0500 FDA clears Beckman Coulter Life Sciences AQUIOS STEM System for stem cell analysis
新研究显示胡萝卜汁可增强免疫反应，减少炎症丹麦研究人员在《营养》杂志上发表的一项研究表明，食用富含 falcarinol 和 falcarindiol 的胡萝卜汁会影响人体血液中的急性炎症介质和先天免疫反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/Carrot-juice-boosts-immune-response-cuts-inflammation-new-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/Carrot-juice-boosts-immune-response-cuts-inflammation-new-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7b966726-d064-432a-9736-e5d65328f733 Mon, 04 Dec 2023 23:39:00 -0500 Carrot juice boosts immune response, cuts inflammation, new study reveals
褐海藻成为控制糖尿病的有力盟友《营养》杂志上的一项研究发现，食用褐藻 (BSC) 可以有效控制 2 型糖尿病 (T2D) 风险并调节患者的血糖水平。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/Brown-seaweed-emerges-as-a-potes-ally-in-diabetes-control.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/Brown-seaweed-emerges-as-a-potes-ally-in-diabetes-control.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=adbf2907-f4e6-4b20-bb5d-c85238d86b63 Mon, 04 Dec 2023 23:14:00 -0500 Brown seaweed emerges as a potent ally in diabetes control
澳大利亚研究表明轮班工人优先考虑睡眠而不是饮食和锻炼在《活动、久坐和睡眠行为杂志》上发表的一项研究中，研究人员发现，虽然 49% 的澳大利亚成年人优先考虑饮食，但轮班工人主要优先考虑睡眠，而且这种偏好随着多年轮班工作经验的增加而增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/Australian-study-shows-shift-workers-prioritize-sleep-over-diet-and-exercise.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/Australian-study-shows-shift-workers-prioritize-sleep-over-diet-and-exercise.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=07047b5d-69ab-44ea-8a48-95662d5d1a74 Mon, 04 Dec 2023 22:54:00 -0500 Australian study shows shift workers prioritize sleep over diet and exercise
主要公共卫生组织敦促高危患者注射流感疫苗在全国流感疫苗接种周（2023 年 12 月 4 日至 8 日）期间，主要公共卫生组织鼓励尚未接种流感疫苗的所有人接种流感疫苗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/Leading-public-health-groups-urge-high-risk-病人-to-get-flu-shot.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/Leading-public-health-groups-urge-high-risk-病人-to-get-flu-shot.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0b9c8764-61a2-48eb-af5e-d8316d1e7a44 Mon, 04 Dec 2023 22:46:44 -0500 Leading public health groups urge high-risk patients to get flu shot
年轻人受到与大流行相关的焦虑和抑郁的打击最严重JAMA Network Open 的一项研究揭示了在 COVID-19 大流行期间美国成年人的焦虑和抑郁程度与年龄相关的差异，其中年轻人（18-39 岁）经历的这些心理健康问题的程度更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/Younger-adults-hit-hardest-by-pandemic-lated-anxiety-and-depression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/Younger-adults-hit-hardest-by-pandemic-lated-anxiety-and-depression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=114c5e8c-25d3-46c2-ae0d-b5c1bdda2873 Mon, 04 Dec 2023 22:24:00 -0500 Younger adults hit hardest by pandemic-related anxiety and depression
研究发现 Omicron 感染与男性大脑结构变化有关研究表明，感染 SARS-CoV-2 Omicron 变体的男性大脑结构会发生变化，包括灰质厚度和皮质下核体积减少。这些基于 MRI 数据和临床症状的发现强调了 Omicron 感染对神经系统的影响，有助于我们了解 COVID-19 对大脑的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/Omicron-infection-linked-to-brain-struct-changes-in-men-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/Omicron-infection-linked-to-brain-struct-changes-in-men-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2fadd266-ced6-430c-b873-9b8b55e9714f Mon, 04 Dec 2023 22:14:00 -0500 Omicron infection linked to brain structure changes in men, study finds
普通膳食补充剂可以预防慢性隐孢子虫感染弗朗西斯·克里克研究所的研究人员发现，一种常见的膳食补充剂可以预防慢性隐孢子虫感染，这种感染在两岁以下的儿童和卫生条件较差的地区尤其普遍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/Common-dietary-supplement-could-protect-against-chronic-Cryptosporidium-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/Common-dietary-supplement-could-protect-against-chronic-Cryptosporidium-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eb87767e-0844-484b-ad93-1f5bef841ca8 Mon, 04 Dec 2023 21:54:07 -0500 Common dietary supplement could protect against chronic Cryptosporidium infections
研究发现，控制高血压可能不足以预防相关的认知能力下降威尔康奈尔医学院的研究人员发现，控制高血压可能不足以预防相关的认知能力下降。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/Controlling-high-blood-Pressure-may-not-be-enough-to-prevent-lated-cognitive-declines-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/Controlling-high-blood-Pressure-may-not-be-enough-to-prevent-lated-cognitive-declines-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=61e61dfb-6c8f-497f-85df-03cd8bb965c4 Mon, 04 Dec 2023 21:28:53 -0500 Controlling high blood pressure may not be enough to prevent related cognitive declines, study finds
饮食在降低阿尔茨海默病风险方面发挥着重要作用在发表在《阿尔茨海默病杂志》上的一项详细研究《饮食在改变阿尔茨海默病风险中的作用：历史和现状的理解》中，我们终于可以看到哪些饮食有助于降低患阿尔茨海默病的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/Diets-play-a-major-role-in-reducing-the-risk-of-Alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/Diets-play-a-major-role-in-reducing-the-risk-of-Alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8ececbc5-259d-45f6-9f72-44a47f323a67 Mon, 04 Dec 2023 20:30:38 -0500 Diets play a major role in reducing the risk of Alzheimer's disease
